content.raw: Be aware that since your lyse qt5 changes include pep8 formatting, it won't merge with your other pending lyse pull requests - might be worth avoiding doing too much work on it until the other pull requests are merged. I'll take a look at the other pull requests tomorrow to see where they're at and see if we can get them merged soon.
